description.value: You know the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.1UP8YL8Z33NMUI5P]{Minor Wonder} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.MRQUPL1D078DKFR2]{No Reproach} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.YCQC074MGCT6R2NY]{Ultimatum} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence is your spellcasting attribute for it (chosen when you select this race).
